    Toast

    trackingToastBS5.Rd

    This will display a toast prompting the user to enable (or disable) tracking if it is not already enabled. Place this function in your UI.

    Usage

    trackingToastBS5(
  position = c("top-right", "top-left", "bottom-left", "bottom-right", "bottom", "top"),
  prompt = "Enable cookie tracking?",
  accept = "Accept",
  reject = "Reject",
  auto_hide = FALSE,
  delay = 5000L,
  animation = TRUE,
  background = c("", "white", "dark", "success", "danger", "warning", "info", "primary",
    "secondary"),
  full_width = FALSE,
  enable_opts = list()
)

    Arguments

    position

    Position of toast

    prompt

    Text to display.

    accept, reject

    Test to display on buttons.

    auto_hide

    Whether to automatically hide the toast.

    delay

    Delay before the toast is hidden, only applies if auto_hide is TRUE.

    animation

    Whether to animate the prompt.

    background

    Background color of the toast.

    full_width

    Whether to show the toast in full width.

    enable_opts

    Options to pass to shinymetrics_enable().

    Note

    You can build your own fully custom prompt this is here for convenience should you not want to do so.
